definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: Her stomach trouble is much better than before.
sentences.chinese: 她的胃病比先前好多了。

sentences.english: Remember those questions you wrote down before?
sentences.chinese: 还记得你先前写下的那些问题吗？

sentences.english: The velocity distributions previously shown were for a single angle of attack.
sentences.chinese: 先前的速度分布列分别为单一迎角。

sentences.english: Pastes previously copied or cut clipboard contents.
sentences.chinese: 粘贴先前复制或剪切的剪贴板内容。

sentences.english: The worst cities are clustered in former housing bubble areas like Florida and California.
sentences.chinese: 最糟糕的城市集中在先前房价疯长的佛罗里达和加州。

sentences.english: Betrayal does, andit’s a book that has a little more plot than other books of mine.
sentences.chinese: 关于我个人的情节也比先前写的书多一些。

sentences.english: Mr Sallah had only recently had earlier charges dropped against him, following public pressure.
sentences.chinese: 迫于公众压力，先前对他的指控最近才得以消除。

sentences.english: Previously also speak Mandarin, Sichuan, guests hear the words, but also with soil any more.
sentences.chinese: 先前还讲普通话，听到客人是四川话，也用土话了。

sentences.english: Previously each city had its own elementalist temple.
sentences.chinese: 先前每个城市有它自己的自然力守护神的寺庙。

sentences.english: Dr Schnall's study was inspired by some previous work of her own.
sentences.chinese: Schnall博士的研究受她先前研究工作的启发。

sentences.english: Next, we connect to the database as we have done previously.
sentences.chinese: 接下来，我们像先前那样连接到数据库。

sentences.english: You may experience what I call the fog of brain.
sentences.chinese: 你也许会经历我先前所说的大脑昏昏沉沉这个状态。

sentences.english: Annealing also relieves internal stresses previously set up in the metal.
sentences.chinese: 退火也释放了先前在金属中的内应力。

sentences.english: But the safety of precut EPT remains controversial.
sentences.chinese: 但内视镜乳突先前切开术之安全性有待评估。

sentences.english: If a quick catalog has previously been selected, that catalog will be loaded and displayed.
sentences.chinese: 如果先前有快速星表被选中，在目录中就会有显示。

sentences.english: Previous studies have shown the cat’s embedded cry shares a similar frequency.
sentences.chinese: 先前的研究已经表明猫的嵌入叫声具有相近的频率。

definition: only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
contrary to what one might expect/actually/contrariwise/why don't you
to appear to be/to seem as if
